document.full_text: san jose sharks winger dany heatley has been suspended two games without pay for delivering an elbow to the head of dallas' steve ott, the nhl said on its website (nhl.com) on wednesday.
document.title: san jose's dany heatley handed two-game ban for elbow
lines_and_colors: san jose sharks winger dany heatley has been suspended two games without pay for delivering an elbow to the head of dallas' steve ott, the nhl said on its website (nhl.com) on wednesday.
